author: Crazy_Chris
title: Unique, but a little bit flawed
review:
Overview
Year of release: 1981
Last year in catalog: 1984
Set type: supplemental
Generation (within grey era): 1.5
Predecessor (within grey era): none
Successor (within grey era): none

Description
Introduced in 1981, this set enhances your train layout bay a remote-controlled decoupling unit. It is the only remote-controlled element that did not last until 1990, because it was dropped from the line-up in 1985.

Variants and alternate parts
No variants or alternate parts are known for this set.

Personal opinion
This is the only item of the grey era which is a little bit flawed. It works fine, as long everything is adjusted perfectly. If this isn't the case, there will be problems and malfunction. Maybe this was the reason why it was discontinued after 1984.
